column4: hey, i'm trying to make a bootable usb on windows using the latest unetbootin... I've formatted my drive to fat32, the windows standard. It's not booting... What is windows doing wrong?
firts question: did you set up booting from USB? (in BIOS)?
2nd question: does it boot from the stick at all (with errors) ?
No, i'm getting a "remove all disks then push any button to reboot" error
that message comes at the end of a live CD/USB session
couldn't tell you why i'm getting it then
